com.linkedin.cubert.block

Interface Block

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedTupleOperatorBlock, ContextBlock, CubertBlock, EmptyBlock, LocalFileBlock, PivotedBlock, RubixMemoryBlock, TupleOperatorBlock, TupleStoreBlock

    public interface Block
    A block of Tuples of a dataset. Each block is uniquely identified by a blockId and partitionKey. Each block is aware of the schema of the columns in the Tuples. The rows can be retrieved via the next method. Note that object returned by this call may be reused for subsequent call. If the tuple must be retained, the called must make a copy via the Tuple.clone() method.
